title: CCO Optimize Command Arguments
description: JSON Schema for /cco:optimize command argument validation

auto.description: Fully unattended mode for CI/CD, pre-commit, cron jobs. No questions, all 10 scopes, all severities.

preview.description: Analyze only, show findings and quality score, don't apply fixes

scope.description: Run specific scope(s) only. Comma-separated. Valid: security, hygiene, types, performance, ai-hygiene, robustness, privacy, doc-sync, simplify

allOf.description: Mutual exclusivity: --preview and --auto are mutually exclusive

examples.description: Silent full optimization (all scopes, all severities)
Preview findings without fixing (includes quality score)
